mapper.insert: insert into Employees (first_name, last_name, position, department) values (${employee.name}, ${employee.lastName}, ${employee.position}, ${employee.department})
mapper.select: select p.id as passport_id, p.number as passport_number, p.expire_date as passport_date_expire, e.id as employee_id, e.first_name as employee_name, e.last_name as employee_last_name, e.position as employee_position, e.department as employee_department, k.id as kitchen_id, a.city as address_city, a.street as address_street from Passports p left join Employees e on p.id = e.passport_id left join Kitchen_employees ke on e.id = ke.employee_id left join Kitchens k on k.id = ke.kitchen_id left join Addresses a on a.id = e.address_id
